meaningMnemonic: There are <radical>nine</radical> <radical>bird</radical>s and one of them is a <kanji>dove</kanji> and another is a <kanji>pigeon</kanji>. These nine birds are a flock of all kinds, but the dove and the pigeon are the leaders.
readingMnemonic: Take a look at the <kanji>pigeon</kanji> in front of you. Now, grab it, tear it in half, and grab the <reading>heart</reading> (はと) from its little body.
